sentences.en: Marriages are built on a foundation of responsibility, dependability and predictability.
sentences.cn: 婚姻的基础应该具备责任心 、 可靠性和可预见性.

sentences.en: Maybe that's the definition of predictability?
sentences.cn: 也许那就是可预测性的定义？

sentences.en: Physicians experience smoother deflection and greater predictability.
sentences.cn: 医生能调节更平滑的弯曲,并有更大的可预见性.

sentences.en: Predictability is one thing, fear of change is something else.
sentences.cn: 可以预见是一回事, 怕改变又是一回事.

sentences.en: Stability, reliability, and predictability are the means of achieving peace of mind.
sentences.cn: 稳定性、可靠性和可预测性是达到内心宁静的方法。

sentences.en: The ICRS offers several advantages, including predictability, safety, stability, reversibility and adjustability.
sentences.cn: 而且具有可预测性 、 安全性 、 稳定性及可逆性和可调换性的优点.

sentences.en: The price was a loss of predictability.
sentences.cn: 欧洲央行这么做的代价是丧失可预测性.

sentences.en: The Transient Stability Control System of the on - line Predictability is described.
sentences.cn: 描述了在线预决策的暂态稳定控制系统.

sentences.en: There really are pockets of predictability out there.
sentences.cn: 这个世界上,确实存在着可预测性口袋.

sentences.en: This rule significantly enhance the legal certainty and predictability.
sentences.cn: 这一规则明显增强了法律的确定性和可预测性.

sentences.en: Uniformity and predictability are also important in many areas of economic regulation.
sentences.cn: 在许多经济调控领域,一致性和预见性也是非常重要的.

sentences.en: Variability and predictability: what can you do about it?
sentences.cn: 变化性和预测性: 我们能做什么?

sentences.en: We can resolve the paradox in part by distinguishing determinism from predictability.
sentences.cn: 我们应该把决定论和可预见性区分开来,这样就能部分地解决这个自相矛盾的问题.

sentences.en: We need to improve the predictability and quality of our software across the board.
sentences.cn: 我们需要把提高软件的可预测性和质量提上日程。

sentences.en: We predicated our entire system on predictability.
sentences.cn: 我们断定我们整个系统都有问题.

sentences.en: Whereas schooling has a certain predictability, education quite often produces surprises.
sentences.cn: 上学读书多少有点可预见性, 而教育往往能带来意外的发现.

sentences.en: Your mother values the predictability of your Sunday calls.
sentences.cn: 你母亲很看重你周日电话的可预知性。

sentences.en: Your predictability gives them a sense of control.
sentences.cn: 你的可预测性给别人易于控制的感觉.

words.tran_cn: 作出预言；作预料，作预报
